name: Interstellar Transport Planner
description:
Created for Mini Jam 63: Future

Interstellar Transport Planner is the newest corporate technology for automating cargo transport. You work as an Automator, designing plans to automate transport routines with bots on one of Saturn's moons, Titan. It is your responsibility to design plans that bring our company's cargo to its destination. 

Controls
  • Left Click to select bots, select the hotbar, place bots, and move bots. Can also drag bots to trash can.
  • Right Click to unselect or to change timing.
  • R Key to rotate blocks.
  • Space Key to pause/run.
Extra Tutorializing
  • If blocks are overlapping, change their interval by pausing, left-clicking on them, and then right-clicking to change their timing
  • Crawler Bots
    • Crawl in the direction of the arrow, moving any blocks until they are immovable
  • Pusher Bots 
    • Push the block directly in front of the arrow
  • Puller Bots
    • Pull blocks towards itself
  • Rotator Bots
    • Rotates the blocks in front of it, by 90 degrees
Credits

Game Design, Art, and Programming - Nicholas Banning

Color Design - Marilou Huxman

Music - Pamgaea Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
